invalid-password: The password is incorrect. Attempts remaining:
user-abort: The transaction was canceled by the user. To confirm a transaction, hold the BitBox touch button for 4 seconds.
user-timeout: Timed out. To confirm a transaction, hold the BitBox touch button for 4 seconds.
not-initialized: The BitBox is not initialized. Use Shift Cryptosecurity's BitBox App to set up a wallet.
upgrade-firmware: Please upgrade to the newest firmware using Shift Cryptosecurity's BitBox App.
unsupported-firmware: MyEtherWallet does not yet support this version of the firmware
